title: Amy’s Son Wants to Be Called Something Different + Bobby Shares Pet Peeves His Girlfriend Has About Him + Raymundo Reveals Family Wedding Drama
itunes:title: Amy’s Son Wants to Be Called Something Different + Bobby Shares Pet Peeves His Girlfriend Has About Him + Raymundo Reveals Family Wedding Drama
description:
Amy says her son came to her and wants to be called something different on the radio. Bobby shares the things he does that annoys his girlfriend. Plus, we get an update from Raymundo on his wedding and he reveals the real reason his twin brother isn’t coming!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
